mn36:10.5: netaṁ ṭhānaṁ → netaṁ kho ṭhānaṁ (bj, pts1ed)
mn36:11.1: Na hi nūna → naha nūna (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn36:14.12: attano → idaṁ padaṁ bj, sya-all, pts1ed potthakesu
mn36:22.4: muddhani → muddhāni (bj); muddhānaṁ (sya-all, pts1ed) | ūhananti → ūhanti (si); ohananti (sya-all, km); uhananti (mr)
mn36:22.5: muddhani abhimattheyya → muddhānaṁ abhimantheyya (si, pts1ed); muddhānaṁ abhimattheyya (sya-all, km)
mn36:26.6: vihāro tveva so → vihārotveveso (bj) | arahato evarūpo hotī’ti → vihārotveveso arahato ti
mn36:27.7: ajjhohāreyyuṁ → ajjhohareyyuṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr) | ajajjitaṁ → ajaddhukaṁ (bj, pts1ed); jaddhukaṁ (sya-all, km)
